unnormalised: Crop insurance, a real game-changer, eh? Heard even farmers in Kerala are signing up after the heavy rains this Onam. My uncle Ramesh from UP says PMFBY helped him last year when the wheat crop failed. He could at least recover some Rs. 50000. Though, claims process can be slow sometimes, like waiting for biryani on Eid! Wish it covered more smaller farmers near our village, only a few km away.
normalised: Crop insurance, a real game changer, eh? Heard even farmers in Kerala are signing up after the heavy rains this Onam. My uncle Ramesh from U P says P M F B Y helped him last year when the wheat crop failed. He could at least recover some rupees fifty thousand. Though, claims process can be slow sometimes, like waiting for biryani on Eid! Wish it covered more smaller farmers near our village, only a few kilometer away.
